str2: Joseph -- 'he increases', a son of Jacob, also the name of several Israelites

parse: Preposition-l | Noun - feminine plural construct | third person masculine plural
str2: A family, circle of relatives, a class, a species, sort, a tribe, people
Manasseh -- 'causing to forget', a son of Joseph, also a king of Judah, also two Israelites

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
str2: Ephraim -- a son of Joseph, also his descendants and their territory
